item.title: Higher Education Leaders Finally Start To Realize Their Entire Industry Is Worthless
item.description: An article in higher education's flagship magazine is more evidence that academia is starting to recognize it needs to change.

item.title: 2024’s Biggest Loser Was Barack Obama
item.description: From 2024's vantage point, is there any way to look at Barack Obama's legacy but as a tragic blight on American history?

item.title: What Elon And Vivek Get Wrong About H-1B Immigration And American Exceptionalism
item.description: If the election didn’t make this clear, I’ll state it as plainly as possible: We want less immigration. That includes H-1B workers.

item.title: Contrary To Media Claims, Deporting Illegal Alien Criminals Will Save Taxpayers More Than It Costs
item.description: Immigration advocacy organizations are out to create shock-value numbers that overestimate the real costs of deportation.

item.title: Demons Must Be Delighted At How Badly Americans Have Butchered Marriage
item.description: As Screwtape told Wormwood, 'The aim is to guide each sex away from those members of the other with whom spiritually helpful, happy, and fertile marri...
